transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello haan ji madam.
Customer: Haan sir join kar liya aapne?
Executive: Haan join kar liya. Abhi ye bataye usme aapka matlab mic theek hai waha se baat karu ya call pe hi connect rahenge?
Customer: Isme mic to actually desktop hai to mic to nahi hoga isme laptop pe ho sakta hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Laptop se nahi koi issue?
Customer: Nahi nahi ye koi baat nahi aapka system me hi login hai aapka IndiaMART seller panel?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Okay okay to screen share karni hai aapko aati hai mai batau kaise karte hai?
Customer: Nahi mere ko nahi aati hai.
Executive: Haan mai batati hu. Jaise abhi jaise ki aapne meet join kariye sabse pehla option aa raha hai wo aapko mic ka uske side me video ka hai uske side me ek box me arrow bana hua hai.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai to uspe click kariye.
Customer: Kar diya.
Executive: Click kar diya? Uske baad aapko aa raha hoga ki window screen share karni chrome tab aur entire screen to entire screen pe click kariye.
Executive: Aur fir jo screen aa rahi hogi uspe tab kariye fir blue color ka share option dikh raha hoga aapko.
Customer: Haan screen share hogi abhi IndiaMART pe jaiye welcome to seller panel jo first tab open kiya hua hai aapne.
Executive: Haan abhi jo ye product hai theek hai jo aap bata rahe ki aapne new product add kara hai. To isme kya issue aa raha hai mujhe bataye ek photo side me choti photo hai.
Customer: Ye nahi chahiye ye jo picture dikh rahi hai na yaha pe back ye nahi chahiye ye wali chahiye.
Executive: Theek hai ek second rukiye.
Executive: To maine kya kara maine photo pe choti wali photo pe tab kiya theek hai.
Executive: Jaise ki aap bhi click kariye mai aapko batati hu choti wali photo pe click kariye click kar diya? Ab dekhiye side me aapko jo pehli photo hai usme yellow color ka ek flag ban raha hai to ye wali photo ko side me ha isko long press karke idhar leke aa jaiye.
Executive: Pehli wali photo ki jagah. Nahi nahi choti choti ha ha ha bas bas bas.
Executive: Bas ab usko upload niche upload photos pe click kariye.
Executive: Haan yaha se crop idhar isko hide kariye hide hide pe click kariye hide.
Executive: Blue color ka hide ab yes kar dijiye yes yes.
Executive: Haan ab upload kar dijiye.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye.
Executive: Ek minute usko refresh kariye.
Executive: Mai karti hu yaha se isko.
Executive: Dekhiye ab ye ho gayi hai theek hai aapki photo ek baar refresh kar lijiye.
Executive: Upar se refresh kariye page ko haan.
Executive: Dekhiye theek hai abhi?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur ab aap iska price change karna hai price change kar sakte hai score badhana hai aur score badha sakte hai iska.
Executive: Description likhna hai description wo likh sakte hai aur bataye.
Executive: Aur jo jaise ki out of stock product hai usko deactivate kar sakte hai.
Customer: Ye out of stock product hai.
Executive: Browser haan nahi mai sahi kar raha hu ji actually us hisab se set karunga mai. Mai apna browser dalna chah raha tha isme wo kaise dalu?
Executive: Browser dalna hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To add PDF pe click kariye.
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: Jaise ye product hai koi bhi product hai ye koi bhi product hai uske niche do option hai.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute.
Customer: Download kar lu.
Customer: Abhi bolana padega.
Customer: Boliyo kya hoga.
Customer: Haan ja raha hai wo log pura.
Customer: Ek minute rukiye mai kar raha hu.
Customer: Thoda time do kam hai haan kar raha hu abhi sath sath me.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Ek kaam karo mere ko ek baar wo catalog thi na hamari wo catalog mere ko whatsapp dalna mere number pe 91 number pe.
Customer: Dalo fatafat.
Customer: Hello na abhi manga raha hu mai. Accha ek product aur mere ko add karna tha isme ye ho gaya ab ye jo maine isme add kiya hai yaha to ab mai isme liquid bhi add kar deta hu. Ab isme mere ko patanik plus hai na wo liquid chahiye.
Executive: Aur aisa bhi hota hai sir jaise ki product hai aap photos add karenge but uska kabhi kabhi aisa hoga aapko lagega ki aapne put add kar diya but uska scroll nahi suppose jo hai bhar nahi raha hai wo kyuki jo product
Customer: Haan ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to change product picture.

- Customer wants to add browser to product.

- Customer wants catalog on WhatsApp.

- Customer wants to add liquid to product.



Resolution:

- Executive guided customer to change product picture.

- Executive guided customer to add browser.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send catalog on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product picture, browser, catalog, whatsapp
